overview:
About Us

Exceed Soft, a fast growing Yemeni information Technology Company, was formed by a group of professional IT individuals to be the leading full Technology solutions and training provider for public & private sectors organizations in Yemen and the regional countries.

Vision

To be the leading full Technology solutions and training provider for public & private sectors organizations in Yemen and the regional countries. Mission

In light of our vision, Our core mission is to provide high quality IT and Engineering solutions to the market in Yemen and the Middle East. Philosophy

Exceedâ€™s philosophy is to meet the unique IT Solution needs of each customer to achieve the business goals and objectives, with personal attention, expert staff and well-resourced facilities. Values

Exceed affirms the following values:

* Commitment to delivering up-to-date and state-of-the-art business and technology solutions by top notch experts
* Dedication to excellence and Quality assurance of development and support services
* Honesty and professionalism
* Civic responsibility
* Collaboration and partnerships
* Continuous creative thinking and innovation
